results.description: Watch all the best action from day 10 of the Women's World Cup, including a brilliant goalkeeping display from Chile's Christiane Endler, and guitar skills from Brazil's Marta.

results.description: The development of women's rugby is "moving in the right direction" but remains a "very slow process", says England hooker Amy Cokayne.

results.description: England fly-half Katy Mclean calls for the "landscape to change" for women's sport following the Rugby World Cup in Ireland.

results.description: England's reign as world champions is ended by a magnificent performance from New Zealand as the Black Ferns run in seven tries in Belfast.

results.description: Relive the action as England beat the USA, Wales beat Hong Kong and Ireland lose to France in the final round of World Cup pool games.
